nodes.text: The NR2 gully jumper, also known as the NR2 light transport, was a vessel produced by Celestial Industries and used by the Galactic Republic during the Great Galactic War.

A larger version of the similar Rendaran-class assault shuttle, the NR2 gully jumper was a long-range shuttle used by the Galactic Republic during the Great Galactic War. The boarding ramp was located in the "chin" of the craft.

When the Sith Empire launched an attack on the Republic capital world of Coruscant, they crashed a stolen gully jumper through the Jedi Temple main entrance. When the shuttle came to a stop, the boarding hatch opened to reveal a horde of Sith Warriors, led by Lord Adraas, who proceeded to engage the Jedi in a pitched battle that left the temple in ruins.
